short_description: This function runs cross validation for analytics functions.
long_description: This function runs cross validation for analytics functions to evaluate models.

output_tables.name: CVTable
output_tables.rDescription: The name of the output table that contains the cross-validation errors for all models. Default is ‘cvtable’.
output_tables.description: The name of the output table that contains the cross-validation errors for all models. Default is ‘cvtable’.

argument_clauses.name: Function
argument_clauses.rDescription: The name of the function to be cross-validated. Only ta.glm (‘glm’) is supported.
argument_clauses.description: The name of the function to be cross-validated. Only GLM (‘glm’) is supported.

argument_clauses.name: CVParams
argument_clauses.rDescription: The list of the arguments that will be used in cross validation
argument_clauses.description: The list of the arguments that will be used in cross validation

argument_clauses.name: FoldNum
argument_clauses.rDescription: The value of k in k-fold cross validation. Default is 10.
argument_clauses.description: The value of k in k-fold cross validation. Default is 10.

argument_clauses.name: Metric
argument_clauses.rDescription: Error function used to calculate the cross-validation error. Possible values are ‘AUROC’ (area under the ROC curve) and ‘MSE’ (mean squared error). Default is 'AUROC'.
argument_clauses.description: Error function used to calculate the cross-validation error. Possible values are ‘AUROC’ (area under the ROC curve) and ‘MSE’ (mean squared error). Default is 'AUROC'.
